consummate.translation[0].definitions[0]: a great performance from a consummate actor
He won the race with consummate ease  (=very easily).
De Gaulle conducted his strategy with consummate skill.
consummate.translation[0].definitions[1]: used to emphasize how bad someone or something is
consummate.translation[1].definitions[0]: to make a marriage or relationship complete by having sex
consummate.translation[1].definitions[1]: to make something complete, especially an agreement
